mapper.select: SELECT id, hotel_level, price_difference, is_base_level, description, daily_single_room_supplement, created_at, updated_at FROM hotel_price_differences ORDER BY price_difference ASC
SELECT id, hotel_level, price_difference, is_base_level, description, daily_single_room_supplement, created_at, updated_at FROM hotel_price_differences WHERE hotel_level = #{hotelLevel} LIMIT 1
SELECT id, hotel_level, price_difference, is_base_level, description, daily_single_room_supplement, created_at, updated_at FROM hotel_price_differences WHERE is_base_level = 1 LIMIT 1
SELECT id, hotel_level, price_difference, is_base_level, description, daily_single_room_supplement, created_at, updated_at FROM hotel_price_differences WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO hotel_price_differences (hotel_level, price_difference, is_base_level, description, daily_single_room_supplement, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{hotelLevel}, #{priceDifference}, #{isBaseLevel}, #{description}, #{dailySingleRoomSupplement}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE hotel_price_differences SET hotel_level = #{hotelLevel}, price_difference = #{priceDifference}, is_base_level = #{isBaseLevel}, description = #{description}, daily_single_room_supplement = #{dailySingleRoomSupplement}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
